Key Match Events: Burundi opened the scoring with Chimwemwe Idana's own goal in the 22nd minute.
Chawanangwa Kaonga equalized for Malawi with a goal in the 31st minute.
Jean Claude Girumugisha gave Burundi the lead again in the 33rd minute.
Lanjesi Nkhoma equalized for Malawi in the second half with an assist from Kaonga.
Mokono Elie Eldhino sealed Burundi's win with a goal in the 87th minute.
Post-Match Reflections: The win moves Burundi to the top of Group L.
Malawi will face Senegal in their next matches.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was the Group L opener for both teams.
